name: Airport Operators Association
membership:
ACI EUROPE
Association of Professional Political Consultants (APPC)
goal: The Airport Operators Association (AOA) is the trade association that represents UK airports. Its mission is to see UK airports grow sustainably. It represents the views of UK airports to Government, Parliament and Regulators to secure policy outcomes that help deliver our mission. The AOA represents some 50+ UK airports in the UK. For more information, please visit www.aoa.org.uk.
euInitiatives:
EU Commission review of aviation regulation
Airports Package
EU Air Passenger Rights
